page.title: 15School Camp,Mundesley,1985
page.content: For the first time in about eighteen years children from Peak Dale Primary School have been to School Camp.The Camp is organised every year by the Derbyshire Schools' Camping Association and is held in Norfolk at Mundesley_On_Sea, between Cromer and Great Yarmouth. Our Headmaster,Mr Richards,took fifteen third and fourth year juniors to camp with him.We had to pay forty pounds to go. On Wednesday,17th July,1985,we met Mr Richards at school at seven o'clock in the morning.When all our luggage was packed in the coach we set off.Some of the Mums and Dads waving us off looked a little bit sad,but we were all excited and looking forward to camp.On our way we picked up another school called Kilburn Junior School.
